Title: Idle Zoo World
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description:
⬤ Implemented core gameplay systems, UI, and integrated art assets.
⬤ Imported configuration data from Google Sheets using custom editor tools.
⬤ Implemented rewarded videos and analytics events.
⬤ Maintained and optimized codebase for performance and stability on low-end devices.
⬤ Ensured timely delivery and agile architecture for 5 iterations of the project.
footer:
Idle Resource Management Game, where players can build and manage their own zoo.
Attracting visitors and earning money to expand their collection of animals and facilities.

media.url: https://dendefo.github.io/Idle Zoo World/IDLE Zoo World WebGL Build/index.html

Title: Hidden Match World
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description:
⬤ Implemented core gameplay systems, UI, and integrating art assets.
⬤ Developed level editor tools to streamline content creation.
footer: Hidden Object Puzzle Game, where players search for hidden objects in levels. Main Match mechanic is taken from Zen Match.

Title: Spaceship Defense TD
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description:
⬤ Ensured core and meta are independent and modular for easy updates and additions.
⬤ Collaborated with designers and artists to implement engaging tower defense mechanics and visually appealing assets.
⬤ Optimized performance up to 300 simultaneous enemies on screen without frame drops on low-end devices.
⬤ Created level design tools such as Timeline-based wave editor and Graph-based tower upgrade system.
footer: Tower Defense Game, where player chooses towers and upgrades for his ship and defends against waves of enemies.

Title: Miasma
SubTitle: College Project
Description:
⬤ Responsible for architecture, PRs, code reviews and mentoring other developers.
⬤ Dividing tasks among team members.
⬤ Troubleshooting of URP issues between 2D and 3D rendering.
⬤ Optimizing of GPU performance.
footer: 2.5D Sidescroller Lovecraftian Horror Game where Marie, a ship captain's daughter, navigates a storm-wracked vessel while experiencing terrifying visions that blur reality and nightmare.

Title: Chefhero
SubTitle: Extra-Curricular Project
Description:
⬤ Developed core system including player controls, enemy AI, and level progression.
⬤ Implemented 2D art using 2D rig and IK.
⬤ Implemented meta system of upgrades into the game.
footer: 2D Bullet Heaven Sidescroller where a Chef saves his restaurant from invading food monsters using kitchen utensils and cooking tools.

Title: Horde Switch
SubTitle: Multiplayer powered by Photon Fusion
Description:
⬤ Implemented multiplayer functionality using Photon Fusion.
⬤ Developed core gameplay mechanics and UI integration.
⬤ Optimized network performance for smooth gameplay experience.
footer: 3D Multiplayer Card Game, where players are constantly trying to survive against enemies and outlive the opponent

Title: Dead Lift
SubTitle: Global Game Jam Project
Description: Lead Unity Developer in the team
footer: Local Multiplayer game about getting at the highest point of a zombie tower
